short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An AI mentor to assist solving Leetcode problems

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Leetcode Buddy: AI-Powered Coding Mentor

Boost your problem-solving skills with Leetcode Buddy, a Chrome extension that uses AI to guide you through Leetcode problems.

Features:

- Asks targeted questions to help you think through problems
- Provides hints without giving away solutions
- Adapts to your skill level and learning pace
- Explains core CS concepts and algorithms
- Helps build coding confidence and intuition
- Powered by the latest GPT-4 and Anthropic Claude models

Whether you're prepping for interviews or honing your skills, Leetcode Buddy helps you tackle coding challenges more effectively. Get smarter about problem-solving, one question at a time.
